alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 31 at 6:36PM MST until July 31 at 8:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 845 PM MST. * At 636 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated up to 1.5 inches of rain fell earlier this afternoon. Flash flooding may be occurring in local washes and channels. The threat for flooding will continue into this evening, before diminishing. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Gila Bend and Gila Bend Auxiliary Field. This includes the following streams and drainages... Sand Tank Wash, Sauceda Wash, Quilotosa Wash, Gila River and Bender Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
